nodes.text: Sha-Mar Ma-Dred was the King of Kashir. He had four wives: Tiarri, Kheann, Mirrix and Ashala. Shortly before the First Battle of Geonosis the King and his wives traveled to Coruscant to meet with the Jedi Order and discuss Kashir's admittance into the Galactic Republic. King Ma-dred's wives were smitten with the wonders of Coruscant and the King implored Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker to help him in reining them in.
